summary: Unemployed cowhand Jim Garry is hired by his dishonest friend Tate Riling as muscle in a dispute between homesteaders and cattleman John Lufton.
cast: Robert Mitchum|Barbara Bel Geddes|Robert Preston|Walter Brennan|Phyllis Thaxter|Frank Faylen|Tom Tully|Charles McGraw|Clifton Young|Tom Tyler|George Cooper|Tom Keene|Bud Osborne|Zon Murray|Robert Bray|Erville Alderson|Ruth Brennan|Harry Carey Jr.|Iron Eyes Cody|Ben Corbett|Joe Devlin|Al Ferguson|Clem Fuller|Robert Malcolm|Ted Mapes|Chris-Pin Martin|Al Murphy|Hal Taliaferro
title: Sangre en la luna
